00022 Island::Island(int populationSize,int popInitMethod,int fitnessType,int myrank){
00023 
00024         
00025         this->populationSize = populationSize;
00026         this->popInitMethod= popInitMethod;
00027         this->fitnessType = fitnessType;
00028         this->myrank = myrank;
00029 
00030         t_init=0.0;
00031         t_comp=0.0;
00032         t_comm=0.0;
00033         t_compFitnessEval=0.0;
00034         td=0.0;
00035         for(int i=0;i<5;i++){
00036                 t_compGA[i]=0.0;
00037         }
00038         long sec,usec;
00039 
00040         ga = new GeneticAlgorithm();
00041         width = 20;
00042         char fileName[40];
00043         
00044         sprintf(fileName,"GAData_%d.txt",myrank);
00045         
00046         output.open(fileName);
00047         output << left                      // Left-justify in each field
00048                 << "," << "#Iterations"      // Then, repeatedly set the width
00049                 << "," << "Flow Time"     // and write some data
00050                 << "," << "Execution Time"
00051                 << "," << "Wait Time"
00052                 << endl;
00053 }

00056 void Island::randomInit(){
00057         Schedule aSchedule;
00058         
00059         for(int i=0;i<populationSize;i++){
00060                 aSchedule.clear();
00061                 for(int j=0;j<batchSize;j++){
00062                         aSchedule.push_back((rand()%numOfResources)+0);
00063                 }
00064                 population.push_back(aSchedule);
00065         }
00066 }

00075 void Island::taskMi2fastest(int option) {
00076         
00077         //temporary containers
00078         Schedule s;
00079         vector<int> resources;
00080         vector<int>::iterator iterator;
00081         //vector<double> mips;
00082                 
00083         //first sort miRatings in ascending order
00084         //i.e. shortest task to fastest resource
00085         sort(taskMiRatings.begin(), taskMiRatings.end());
00086         
00087         //if option is '1' then reverse taskMiRatings
00088         //so they are in descending order
00089         //i.e longest task to fastest resource
00090         if(option == 1) {
00091                 reverse(taskMiRatings.begin(), taskMiRatings.end());
00092         }
00093         
00094         for(int i=0;i<populationSize;i++){
00095                 
00096                 //clear temporary containers
00097                 s.clear();
00098                 resources.clear();              
00099                 
00100                 for(int j=0;j<batchSize;j++){
00101                         //pick a ramdom resource ID
00102                         int resID = (rand()%numOfResources)+0;
00103                         //put the resourceID in temp resources container
00104                         resources.push_back(resID);
00105                         //then get resource mips using resID and put it in temp mips container
00106                         //mips.push_back(resourceMipsRatings.at(resID));
00107                 }
00108                 //now we should have 2 containers, one with resource ID's 
00109                 //and one with their mips ratings - and the batch of tasks as well
00110                 
00111                 for(int k = 0; k < batchSize; k++) {
00112                         
00113                         //need to find longest job and fastest resource
00114                         //double longestTask = -1;//init value
00115                         int fastestResource = -1;
00116                         int index;//the index of the fastest resource in resources
00117                         double fastestMips = 0;
00118                         
00119                         for(int l = 0; l < resources.size(); l++) {
00120                                 
00121                                 //get the mips rating of resource at 'l'
00122                                 double temp = resourceMipsRatings.at(resources.at(l));
00123                                 
00124                                 //check if it is the fastest, and update if it is
00125                                 if(temp > fastestMips) {
00126                                         fastestMips = temp;
00127                                         //set fastest resource
00128                                         fastestResource = resources.at(l);
00129                                         index = l;//and index in resources
00130                                 }
00131                         }
00132                         //Righto, now we have found the fastest resource in resources
00133                         //so push it into the schedule
00134                         
00135                         s.push_back(fastestResource);
00136                         //and also remove the resources
00137                         iterator = resources.begin() + index;
00138                         resources.erase(iterator);
00139                         
00140                         //and now do it all again
00141                 }
00142                 population.push_back(s);
00143         }
00144 }

00147 void Island::setTaskMiRatings(vector<double> miRatings){
00148         this->taskMiRatings = miRatings;
00149         this->batchSize = miRatings.size();
00150 }

00152 // vector<double>  Island::getResourceMipsRatings(){
00153 //      return this->resourceMipsRatings;
00154 // }
00155 vector<double> Island::getResourceMipsRatings(){
00156         
00157         vector<double> mipsRatings;
00158         //got through the resourceList, and push the resource's mpis into the vector
00159         for(int i = 0; i < resourceList.size(); i++) {
00160                 Gresource res = resourceList.at(i);
00161                 mipsRatings.push_back(res.mips);
00162         }
00163         numOfResources = resourceList.size();
00164         return mipsRatings;
00165 }
00166 
00167 vector<double> Island::getResourceLoads() {
00168         
00169         vector<double> resourceLoads;
00170         //got through the resourceList, and push the resource's loads into the vector
00171         for(int i = 0; i < resourceList.size(); i++) {
00172                 Gresource res = resourceList.at(i);
00173                 resourceLoads.push_back(res.load);
00174         }
00175         return resourceLoads;
00176 }

00182 Schedule Island::runGA(ResourceList resourceList,vector<double> miRequirements){
00183 //      double startwtime;
00184 //      if (myrank == 0){
00185 //              startwtime = MPI_Wtime();
00186 //      }
00187         timeStart();
00188 
00189         this->resourceList = resourceList;
00190         //      this->taskMiRatings = miRequirements;
00191         this->populationSize = populationSize;
00192         //This also sets the numOfResources 
00193         this->resourceMipsRatings = this->getResourceMipsRatings();
00194         this->resourceLoads = this->getResourceLoads();
00195         population.clear();
00196                         
00197 //      setResourceMipsRatings(mipsRatings);
00198         setTaskMiRatings(miRequirements);
00199         //Initilize the population acoarding to a heuristic
00200         
00201         switch (popInitMethod){
00202         case 0:
00203                 {
00204                         randomInit();
00205                 }
00206                 break;
00207         case 1:
00208                 {
00209                         taskMi2fastest(0);
00210                 }
00211                 break;
00212         case 2:
00213                 {
00214                         taskMi2fastest(1);
00215                 }
00216                 break;
00217         default:
00218                 break;
00219         }
00220         
00221         ga->setPopulation(this->population);
00222         ga->setNumOfResources(this->numOfResources);
00223         ga->setResourceMipsRatings(this->resourceMipsRatings);
00224         ga->setTaskMiRatings(this->taskMiRatings);
00225         ga->setResourcesLoad(this->resourceLoads);
00226         
00232         int n = 1;
00233         
00234         vector<Schedule> parents;       //will hold the selscted parents from the population
00235         vector<Schedule> offsprings;    //will hold the offsprings after crossover
00236         vector<Schedule> candidates;    //will hold the "family", parents and offsprings
00237         Schedule individual;            //used for mutation
00238         double fitness,averageFitness,mutationRate,bestMips,warstMips,randomNum,mutationMax,bestFitness,tempBestFitness;
00239         maxdif = MAX_DOUBLE;
00240         sigma = 0;
00241         vector<Schedule> outgoingImmigrants;
00242         vector<Schedule> incomingImmigrants;
00243         vector<Schedule> population;
00244         
00245         bool end=false;
00246         int index1,index2,noChange,migrationNoChange;
00247         iterations = 0;
00248         noChange = 0;
00249         migrationNoChange = 0;
00250         timeEnd(99);
00251         timeStart();
00252         
00253         //find best and warst schedules, (unrealistic), to normalize the fitness to [0,1], so it may be applyed in the mutationRate
00254         bestMips = *max_element(resourceMipsRatings.begin( ), resourceMipsRatings.end( ));
00255         warstMips = *min_element(resourceMipsRatings.begin( ), resourceMipsRatings.end( ));
00256                 
00257         //get the index of the best resource
00258         for(int i=0;i<resourceMipsRatings.size();i++){
00259                 if(resourceMipsRatings.at(i)==bestMips){
00260                         index1 = i;
00261                         break;
00262                 }
00263         }
00264         
00265         //get the index of the warst resource
00266         for(int i=0;i<resourceMipsRatings.size();i++){
00267                 if(resourceMipsRatings.at(i)==warstMips){
00268                         index2 = i;
00269                         break;
00270                 }
00271         }
00272         
00273         //create an unrealistic schedule, all the tasks in the best resource
00274         Schedule aSchedule;
00275         for(int j=0;j<batchSize;j++){
00276                 aSchedule.push_back(resourceList[index1].id);
00277         }
00278         //get the best fitness
00279         double min = ga->fitnessFunction(aSchedule,fitnessType);
00280         //create an unrealistic schedule, all the tasks in the warst resource
00281         aSchedule.clear();
00282         for(int j=0;j<batchSize;j++){
00283                 aSchedule.push_back(resourceList[index2].id);
00284         }
00285                 
00286         //get the warst fitness
00287         double max = ga->fitnessFunction(aSchedule,fitnessType);
00288         mutationMax = max + 1.0;
00289         timeEnd(1);     
00290         //start the GA loop
00291         while(!end){
00292                 timeStart();
00293                 //take the best fitness before appling a GA
00294 //              bestFitness = ga->fitnessFunction(ga->getBestSchedules(1,fitnessType).at(0),fitnessType);
00295                 //take the average fitness before appling a GA
00296                 averageFitness = ga->getAveragefitness(fitnessType);
00297                 timeEnd(2);
00298                 timeStart();
00299                 candidates.clear();
00300                 //select parents. 0 is random selection
00301                 parents = ga->parentsSelection(0);
00302                 timeEnd(3);
00303                 timeStart();
00304                 //apply crossover. 0 is one point crossover
00305                 offsprings = ga->crossover(parents,0);
00306                 //make the "family"
00307                 candidates.push_back(parents[0]);
00308                 candidates.push_back(parents[1]);
00309                 candidates.push_back(offsprings[0]);
00310                 candidates.push_back(offsprings[1]);
00311                 timeEnd(4);
00312                 timeStart();
00313                 //mutate them accoarding to their fitness
00314                 for(int i=0;i<candidates.size();i++){
00315                         randomNum = double(random()) / (double(RAND_MAX) + 1.0);
00316                         fitness = ga->fitnessFunction(candidates[i],fitnessType);
00317 //                      mutationRate = ((fitness/max) * randomNum );
00318                         mutationRate = ((fitness) + randomNum )/mutationMax;
00319                         individual.clear();
00320                         individual = candidates[i];
00321                         candidates[i] = ga->mutation(individual,mutationRate);                  
00322                 }
00323                 timeEnd(5);
00324                 timeStart();
00325                 ga->naturalSelection(candidates,fitnessType);
00326                 timeEnd(6);
00327                 // End of computation now migrate
00328 
00329                 if(iterations%30==0){
00330                         int immigrantsSize = ga->getPopulation().size()/2;//(random()%6)+1; //1;
00331                 //      MPI_Bcast ( &sigma, 1, MPI_DOUBLE, 0,communicator );
00332                         timeStart();
00333                         outgoingImmigrants.clear();
00334                         incomingImmigrants.clear();
00335                         population.clear();
00336                         population=ga->getPopulation();
00337 //                      population=ga->getBestSchedules(immigrantsSize,fitnessType);
00338                                                 
00339                         for(int i=0;i<immigrantsSize;i++){
00340                                 outgoingImmigrants.push_back(population.at(i));
00341                         }               
00342                                                 
00343                         ga->removeIndividuals(immigrantsSize);
00344 //                      vector<int> indexes =  ga->getIndexOfBestSchedules(immigrantsSize,fitnessType);
00345 //                      for(int i=0;i< indexes.size();i++){
00346 //                              ga->removeIndividualsByIndex(indexes.at(i));
00347 //                      }
00348                         timeEnd(1);
00349                         timeStart();
00350                         incomingImmigrants = migrate(outgoingImmigrants);
00351                         timeEnd(0);
00352                         timeStart();
00353                         for(int i=0;i<outgoingImmigrants.size();i++){
00354                                 ga->addIndividual(outgoingImmigrants.at(i));
00355                         }
00356                         timeEnd(1);
00357                 }
00358                 timeStart();
00359 //              tempBestFitness = ga->fitnessFunction(ga->getBestSchedules(1,fitnessType).at(0),fitnessType);
00360                 double tempDelta = (averageFitness - ga->getAveragefitness(fitnessType));
00361                 double delta=0.0;       
00362                  
00363                 if(tempDelta > delta){
00364                         delta = tempDelta;
00365                 }
00366 //              if(myrank==0){
00367 //                      cout << " delta:" << delta << ":averageFitness:" << averageFitness << endl;
00368 //              }
00369                 timeEnd(1);
00370                 timeStart();
00371                 MPI_Allreduce( &delta, &maxdif, 1, MPI_DOUBLE, MPI_MAX, communicator );
00372                 timeEnd(0);
00373                 timeStart();
00374                 if(maxdif<sigma){
00375                         end = true;
00376                 }
00377                 
00378                 if(iterations%100==0){
00379                         sigma = sigma +  (iterations/9990.1);
00380                 }
00381                 
00382 //              if(myrank==0 && iterations%10==0){
00383 //                      cout << " delta:" << delta << ":averageFitness:" << averageFitness <<":signa:"<< sigma<< endl;
00384 //              }
00385 
00388                 iterations++;
00389                 if(iterations>3000){
00390                         end = true;
00391                 }
00392                 timeEnd(1);
00393         }//end while
00394 //      timeStart();
00395         
00396         vector<Schedule> aPopulation;
00397         aPopulation.clear();
00398 
00399         aPopulation = ga->getBestSchedules(n,fitnessType); 
00400         
00401 //      flowTime = ga->fitnessFunction(aPopulation.at(0),1);
00402 //      executionTime = ga->fitnessFunction(aPopulation.at(0),0);
00403 //      waitTime = ga->fitnessFunction(aPopulation.at(0),2);
00404         
00405         Schedule s = aPopulation.at(0);
00406         
00407 //      outputData();
00408         
00409 //      timeEnd(2);
00410 //      if(myrank==0){
00411 //              cout << MPI_Wtime() - startwtime << endl; 
00412 //      }
00413 
00414         return s;
00415 }

00424                 << "," << flowTime     // and write some data

00448 vector<Schedule> Island::migrate(vector<Schedule> aPopulation){
00449         Schedule aSchedule;
00450         int counter=0;
00451         vector<Schedule> incomingPopulation;
00452         MPI_Status status; 
00453         int allocateSize = aPopulation.size() * aPopulation.at(0).size();
00454         int populationOut[allocateSize];
00455         int populationIn[allocateSize];
00456 
00457 //      //put the popolation in the buffer
00458         for(int i=0;i<aPopulation.size();i++){
00459                 aSchedule.clear();
00460                 aSchedule = aPopulation.at(i);
00461                 for(int j=0;j<aSchedule.size();j++){
00462                         populationOut[counter]=aSchedule.at(j);
00463                         counter++;
00464 //                      cout << " populationOut["<< counter << "]="<<  populationOut[counter] << "aSchedule.at(" << i << ")="<< aSchedule.at(j) << endl;
00465                 }
00466         }       
00467         
00468         MPI_Sendrecv(populationOut, allocateSize, MPI_INT, myLeft, 123, populationIn, allocateSize, MPI_INT, myRight, 123, communicator, &status);
00469         
00470         //extract incoming population
00471         counter =0;
00472         Schedule tempSchedule(aPopulation.at(0).size());
00473         for(int i=0; i< allocateSize;i++){
00474                 if(counter == (batchSize) ){                    
00475                         counter = 0;
00476                         incomingPopulation.push_back(tempSchedule);
00477                 }
00478                 //cout << " populationIn["<< i << "]="<<  populationIn[i] << endl;
00479                 tempSchedule.at(counter) = populationIn[i];
00480                 counter++;
00481                 //add the last schedule
00482                 if(i == (allocateSize) - 1){
00483                         incomingPopulation.push_back(tempSchedule);
00484                 }
00485         }
00486         
00487 //      if(myrank==1){
00488 //              cout << "--------------" << endl;
00489 //              for(int i=0;i<incomingPopulation.size();i++){
00490 //                      cout << "schedule " << i << endl;
00491 //                      for(int j=0;j<incomingPopulation.at(0).size();j++){
00492 //                              cout << "       "<< incomingPopulation.at(i).at(j) << endl;
00493 //                      }
00494 //              }
00495 //      }
00496 
00497         
00498         return  incomingPopulation;
00499 }

00508 void Island::timeStart(){
00509 
00510         if(myrank==0)  
00511         {
00512                 if(gettimeofday(&tp,NULL)==0){
00513                 /* Record the first point of time */
00514                 sec=tp.tv_sec; usec=tp.tv_usec; 
00515         
00516                 }
00517                 else
00518                 {
00519                 perror("Can not get Wall-Clock time!\n");
00520                 MPI_Abort(MPI_COMM_WORLD,EXIT_FAILURE); 
00521                 }
00522         }
00523 }
00524 
00525 void Island::timeEnd(int what){
00526         if(myrank==0)
00527         {
00528                 if(gettimeofday(&tp,NULL)==0)
00529                         {
00530                         sec=tp.tv_sec-sec; 
00531                         usec=tp.tv_usec-usec; 
00532                         /* Get the second point of time */
00533                         td=sec+usec/1.0e6;
00534                         /* Calculate the time difference and print it out */
00535                         switch(what){
00536                                 case 0:
00537                                         t_comm = t_comm+td;
00538                                 break;
00539                                 case 1:
00540                                         t_comp = t_comp+td;
00541                                 break;
00542                                 case 2:
00543                                         {
00544                                         t_comp = t_comp+td;
00545                                         t_compFitnessEval = t_compFitnessEval + td;
00546                                         }
00547                                 break;
00548                                 case 3:
00549                                         {
00550                                         t_comp = t_comp+td;
00551                                         t_compGA[0] = t_compGA[0] +td;
00552                                         }
00553                                 break;
00554                                 case 4:
00555                                         {
00556                                         t_comp = t_comp+td;
00557                                         t_compGA[1] = t_compGA[1] +td;
00558                                         }
00559                                         
00560                                 break;                  
00561                                 case 5:
00562                                         {
00563                                         t_comp = t_comp+td;
00564                                         t_compGA[2] = t_compGA[2] +td;
00565                                         }
00566                                 break;
00567                                 case 6:
00568                                         {
00569                                         t_comp = t_comp+td;
00570                                         t_compGA[3] = t_compGA[3] +td;
00571                                         }
00572                                         
00573                                 break;
00574                                 default :
00575                                         t_init =t_init + td;
00576                                 break;
00577                         }
00578                         
00579                         }
00580                 else
00581                         {
00582                         perror("Can not get Wall-Clock time!\n");
00583                         MPI_Abort(MPI_COMM_WORLD,EXIT_FAILURE); 
00584                         }
00585         }
00586         
00587 }
